mapper.insert: insert into unicom_counter_history_wcdma (name, time, pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessCs, pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptCs, pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessPs, pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptPs, pmTotNoRrcConnectReqSuccess, pmTotNoRrcConnectReq, pmNoLoadSharingRrcConn, pmNoRejRrcConnSpFlowCtrl, pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPsSucc, pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPs, pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnPs, pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCsSucc, pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCs, pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnCs, pmNoRabEstablishSuccessSpeech, pmNoRabEstablishAttemptSpeech, pmNoRabEstablishSuccessPacketInteractive, pmNoRabEstablishAttemptPacketInteractive, pmNoTimesRlAddToActSet, pmNoTimesCellFailAddToActSet, pmNoSystemRabReleaseSpeech, pmNoNormalRabReleaseSpeech, pmNoSystemRabReleasePacket, pmNoSystemRabReleasePacketUra, pmChSwitchAttemptFachUra, pmChSwitchSuccFachUra, pmChSwitchAttemptDchUra, pmChSwitchSuccDchUra, pmChSwitchAttemptHsUra, pmChSwitchSuccHsUra, pmNoNormalRabReleasePacket, pmNoNormalRabReleasePacketUra) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pmnoiusigestablishsuccesscs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoiusigestablishattemptcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoiusigestablishsuccessps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoiusigestablishattemptps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreqsuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoloadsharingrrcconn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnorejrrcconnspflowctrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreqpssucc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreqps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoloadsharingrrcconnps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreqcssucc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmtotnorrcconnectreqcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnoloadsharingrrcconncs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnorabestablishsuccessspeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnorabestablishattemptspeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnorabestablishsuccesspacketinteractive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnorabestablishattemptpacketinteractive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnotimesrladdtoactset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnotimescellfailaddtoactset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnosystemrabreleasespeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnonormalrabreleasespeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnosystemrabreleasepacket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnosystemrabreleasepacketura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchattemptfachura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchsuccfachura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchattemptdchura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchsuccdchura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchattempthsura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmchswitchsucchsura,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnonormalrabreleasepacket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmnonormalrabreleasepacketura,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into unicom_counter_history_wcdma
name,
time,
pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessCs,
pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptCs,
pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessPs,
pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptPs,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReqSuccess,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReq,
pmNoLoadSharingRrcConn,
pmNoRejRrcConnSpFlowCtrl,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPsSucc,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPs,
pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnPs,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCsSucc,
pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCs,
pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnCs,
pmNoRabEstablishSuccessSpeech,
pmNoRabEstablishAttemptSpeech,
pmNoRabEstablishSuccessPacketInteractive,
pmNoRabEstablishAttemptPacketInteractive,
pmNoTimesRlAddToActSet,
pmNoTimesCellFailAddToActSet,
pmNoSystemRabReleaseSpeech,
pmNoNormalRabReleaseSpeech,
pmNoSystemRabReleasePacket,
pmNoSystemRabReleasePacketUra,
pmChSwitchAttemptFachUra,
pmChSwitchSuccFachUra,
pmChSwitchAttemptDchUra,
pmChSwitchSuccDchUra,
pmChSwitchAttemptHsUra,
pmChSwitchSuccHsUra,
pmNoNormalRabReleasePacket,
pmNoNormalRabReleasePacketUra,
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{pmnoiusigestablishsuccesscs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoiusigestablishattemptcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoiusigestablishsuccessps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoiusigestablishattemptps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreqsuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoloadsharingrrcconn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnorejrrcconnspflowctrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreqpssucc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreqps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoloadsharingrrcconnps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreqcssucc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmtotnorrcconnectreqcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnoloadsharingrrcconncs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnorabestablishsuccessspeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnorabestablishattemptspeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnorabestablishsuccesspacketinteractive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnorabestablishattemptpacketinteractive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnotimesrladdtoactset,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnotimescellfailaddtoactset,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnosystemrabreleasespeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnonormalrabreleasespeech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnosystemrabreleasepacket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnosystemrabreleasepacketura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchattemptfachura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchsuccfachura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchattemptdchura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchsuccdchura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchattempthsura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmchswitchsucchsura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnonormalrabreleasepacket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pmnonormalrabreleasepacketura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT name, time, counter1 pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessCs, counter2 pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptCs, counter3 pmNoIuSigEstablishSuccessPs, counter4 pmNoIuSigEstablishAttemptPs, counter5 pmTotNoRrcConnectReqSuccess, counter6 pmTotNoRrcConnectReq, counter7 pmNoLoadSharingRrcConn, counter8 pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPsSucc, counter9 pmTotNoRrcConnectReqPs, counter10 pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnPs, counter11 pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCsSucc, counter12 pmTotNoRrcConnectReqCs, counter13 pmNoLoadSharingRrcConnCs, counter14 pmNoRabEstablishSuccessSpeech, counter15 pmNoRabEstablishAttemptSpeech, counter16 pmNoRabEstablishSuccessPacketInteractive, counter17 pmNoRabEstablishAttemptPacketInteractive, counter18 pmNoTimesRlAddToActSet, counter19 pmNoTimesCellFailAddToActSet, counter20 pmNoSystemRabReleaseSpeech, counter21 pmNoNormalRabReleaseSpeech, counter22 pmNoSystemRabReleasePacket, counter23 pmNoSystemRabReleasePacketUra, counter24 pmChSwitchAttemptFachUra, counter25 pmChSwitchSuccFachUra, counter26 pmChSwitchAttemptDchUra, counter27 pmChSwitchSuccDchUra, counter28 pmChSwitchAttemptHsUra, counter29 pmChSwitchSuccHsUra, counter30 pmNoNormalRabReleasePacket, counter31 pmNoNormalRabReleasePacketUra, counter32, counter33, counter34, counter35, counter36, counter37, counter38, counter39, counter40 FROM unicom_counter_history_wcdma WHERE time = #{time}
SELECT COLUMN_NAME,IS_NULLABLE,COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Sran1' AND TABLE_NAME = 'unicom_counter_history_wcdma';
show columns from unicom_counter_history_lte where Field='${name}'
